c74object.name: rtt.dist~

method.name: in2
method.description: A list of floating points numbers is the histogram that rtt.dist~ uses to determine its output.

method.name: probabilities
method.description: The same as in2, prepended by the list "message probabilities"

c74object.description: rtt.dist~ takes in a list of floating-point numbers and outputs integer values between 1 and the length of the input list. It applies a weighted probability function to the input floating point numbers to decide which index value to output.
